page.title: 12LOCHALSH PUPILS' TRANSPORT
page.content: My name is Rupert Leng.I come from Balmacara,three miles away.I have been to four schools in my life,Mallaig, Canna,Rhum and Lochalsh.I get up at half past eight,get dressed and have breakfast.Then I go down to the bus shelter and wait for the school bus. My name is Andrew Voisey.I go to school at ten to nine. The car picks me up at Stromeferry. My name is Steven MacRae.I come from Achmore.It is seven miles to school. My favourite thing is art.The thing I like least is English. My name is Jason Matheson.I come from Sallachy on the Killilan car. I like school dinners.The thing I don't like about school is tests but I think they are very educational. My favourite dinner is Christmas Dinner.
